title: Vanram ropuiah
lyrics:
Zinkawng khawharah hian lungngaih leh natna te,
Manganna, chungpikna a lo thlen in;
Ka zam thin, ka buai thin, ka mittui a luang fo thin,
Thlen hmabak vanram khi ka ngaizual thin.

Vanram ropuiah chhandamtun min lo hmuak ang,
A kiangah tlansaten an fak ning lo'ng;
Hmangaih vanga ka Lal hmel hliam hnu khan,
Lawmna mittui far chungin ka kuangkuah ang.

Theihtawka rawngbawla kawngdik zawk tum pawhin,
Sawichhiatna, mualphona a lo thleng a;
Ka chhungril a rum thin i rawngbawl a har fo thin,
Chawlhna nuam vanram khi ka ngaizual thin.

Vanah khian ringtute kan parvul ve ang a,
Min hruai dawn kawngkhar mawi chu kan pan ang;
Ka chan tur ka dawn thin thlarauin ka tem lawk thin,
Rinnain chu hmun chu ka thlir fo thin.
